data.Area: All allies and foes within a 40-ft.-radius burst centered on you
data.DescriptionHtml: You bring special favor upon yourself and your allies while bringing disfavor to your enemies. You and your each of your allies gain a +1 luck bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, saves, and skill checks, while each of your foes takes a -1 penalty on such rolls.
data.Name: Prayer
